title: 77/715/EEC: Council Decision of 28 October 1977 on the conclusion of the European Agreement on the exchange of tissue-typing reagents and the Additional Protocol thereto
header:
18.11.1977 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 295/7
COUNCIL DECISION
of 28 October 1977
on the conclusion of the European Agreement on the exchange of tissue-typing reagents and the Additional Protocol thereto
(77/715 /EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The European Agreement on the exchange of tissue-typing reagents and the additional Protocol thereto are hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The texts of the Agreement and the Additional Protocol are annexed hereto.

The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the persons empowered to sign the Agreement and the Additional Protocol and to confer upon them the necessary powers to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 28 October 1977.
For the Council
The President
G. SPITAELS
